item.title: The Brain and Computation, Part 1
item.description:
Measuring Computation

The computational performance of microprocessors can be quantified by measuring the number of floating-point arithmetic operations the processor can perform per second (FLOPS). This number is very useful for comparing different hardware being used for numerically intensive applications like scientific computing or mining fake internet points, but some …

Insight-based AI timeline model
